SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with Manu-MD& or get session id from here, https://manul-ofc-web-tau.vercel.app/

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Bot will all status, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox or groups in small letters (e.g, public)

READ_CMD.description: Bot will read of msgs if it is enabled, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTI_DELETE.description: if person who delete message or media after shiw it and to disable put false (e.g, true)

AUTO_REACT.description: Bot will react to the msgs, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTI_BAD.description: Bot delete the message from group if any bad word detected, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTI_BOT.description: Bot delete or kick bots from group, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTI_LINK.description: Bot delete or kick links sender from group, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep your WhatsApp always online put true to activate (e.g, true)
